ACH_WAY_AROUND.name: A Way Around
ACH_WAY_AROUND.description: Get outside of the school courtyard

ACH_REMAIN_DRY.name: Avoid a Cold
ACH_REMAIN_DRY.description: Use the Planks to Remain Dry

ACH_NO_KILLS.name: Avoid Conflict
ACH_NO_KILLS.description: End the Game without Killing Anyone (without bosses)

ACH_AVOID_VIOLENCE.name: Avoid the Violence
ACH_AVOID_VIOLENCE.description: Defeat Violence in the Laboratory Without Being Hit

ACH_KILL_STEALTH.name: Backlighted
ACH_KILL_STEALTH.description: Kill an enemy with a Stealth Attack

ACH_FREEZE_AND_PUSH.name: Breaking the Ice
ACH_FREEZE_AND_PUSH.description: Freeze an Enemy and Push Him

ACH_EXPOSURE_UNDETECTED.name: Don't be Exposed
ACH_EXPOSURE_UNDETECTED.description: Escape from the Arcade without being detected by Exposure

ACH_3FLASH.name: Don't Look at the Light
ACH_3FLASH.description: Blind Three Enemies at the Same Time

ACH_REMOVE_BATTERY.name: Game Over
ACH_REMOVE_BATTERY.description: Remove the battery from the Arcade core

ACH_FREEZE_ALL_ENEMIES.name: I Love Snowmen
ACH_FREEZE_ALL_ENEMIES.description: Freeze one Enemy of Each Type

ACH_KILL_LIGHT.name: Let There be Light
ACH_KILL_LIGHT.description: Defeat an Enemy with the Flashlight Beam

ACH_TIME_TO_PLAY.name: No Time to Play
ACH_TIME_TO_PLAY.description: Try to play another game by Tequila Works

ACH_HIT_WITH_CAN.name: Oops... Sorry
ACH_HIT_WITH_CAN.description: Hit an enemy with a can

ACH_ENTER_SCHOOL.name: The Place of Nightmares
ACH_ENTER_SCHOOL.description: Enter the school looking for Emily

ACH_SEE_WEIRDNESS.name: What is this place?
ACH_SEE_WEIRDNESS.description: See the weirdness in the school

ACH_SAVE_BOTH.name: You Both Deserve to Go
ACH_SAVE_BOTH.description: Escape with Both Sally and Emily

ENDLESS_TOWER.name: “Endless”
ENDLESS_TOWER.description: Reach the top of the Endless Tower.

NEVRON_QUESTS.name: Aiding the Enemy
NEVRON_QUESTS.description: Finish all of the Nevron quests.

ANCIENT_SANCTUARY.name: Ancient Sanctuary
ANCIENT_SANCTUARY.description: Find your way through Ancient Sanctuary.

OPTIONAL_CAMP.name: Curious
OPTIONAL_CAMP.description: Witness an optional scene at camp.

ESQUIES_NEST.name: Esquie's Nest
ESQUIES_NEST.description: Find your way through Esquie's Nest.

FLYING_WATERS.name: Flying Waters
FLYING_WATERS.description: Find your way through Flying Waters.

JOURNALS.name: Follow The Trail
JOURNALS.description: Find all of the journals from prior expeditions.

FORGOTTEN_BATTLEFIELD.name: Forgotten Battlefield
FORGOTTEN_BATTLEFIELD.description: Find your way through Forgotten Battlefield.

GESTRAL_BEACH.name: Gestral Games
GESTRAL_BEACH.description: Win all of the Gestral games.

GESTRAL_VILLAGE.name: Gestral Village
GESTRAL_VILLAGE.description: Find your way through the Gestral Village.

LOST_GESTRALS.name: Lost Gestrals
LOST_GESTRALS.description: Find all of the Lost Gestrals.

SCIEL_FORETELL.name: Maximization
SCIEL_FORETELL.description: With Sciel, consume 20 Foretell on a single target during Twilight.

GRANDIS_STATION.name: Monoco's Station
GRANDIS_STATION.description: Find your way through the Grandis Station.

OLD_LUMIERE.name: Old Lumière
OLD_LUMIERE.description: Find your way through Old Lumière.

GUSTAVE_OVERCHARGE.name: Overcharge
GUSTAVE_OVERCHARGE.description: With Gustave, use a fully charged Overcharge that Breaks an enemy.

LUNE_STAINS.name: Perfect Flow
LUNE_STAINS.description: With Lune, consume Stains 4 turns in a row.

NO_DAMAGE_BOSS.name: Professional
NO_DAMAGE_BOSS.description: Defeat a boss without taking any damage.

SPRING_MEADOWS.name: Spring Meadows
SPRING_MEADOWS.description: Find your way through Spring Meadows.

STONE_WAVE_CLIFFS.name: Stone Wave Cliffs
STONE_WAVE_CLIFFS.description: Find your way through Stone Wave Cliffs.

MAELLE_STANCES.name: Synergy
MAELLE_STANCES.description: With Maelle, use Percée on a Marked enemy while in Virtuose Stance.

MONOCO_WHEEL.name: Wheel Control
MONOCO_WHEEL.description: With Monoco, cast an Upgraded Skill 4 turns in a row.

DreamOfElectricSheep.name: Do Travelers Dream Of Electric Sheep?
DreamOfElectricSheep.description: Power up a device with the Conductor.

EfficiencyDiscipline.name: Efficiency Discipline
EfficiencyDiscipline.description: Defeat 2 enemies with a single Sword projectile.

FireSpreading.name: Fire. Spreading.
FireSpreading.description: Set 5 enemies on fire with a single burst of the Torch.

ForgedInFire.name: Forged In Fire
ForgedInFire.description: Fully upgrade the Traveler's Temporal Shell.

HitLikeATrain.name: Hit Like A Train
HitLikeATrain.description: Defeat the Terror at the station B.

PublicTransport.name: Public Transport
PublicTransport.description: Power up the tram to reach the Steelworks.

PunksNotDead.name: Punks Not Dead!
PunksNotDead.description: Finish the game with Edward's Essence.

RagingBull.name: Raging Bull
RagingBull.description: Defeat an enemy with a melee attack.

ShellNotCompromised.name: Shell Not Compromised
ShellNotCompromised.description: Finish the game in the Hard Mode.

TemporalDestinationReached.name: Temporal Destination Reached
TemporalDestinationReached.description: Execute a Dive for the first time.

TheAnnihilator.name: The Annihilator
TheAnnihilator.description: Defeat 5 enemies with a single Arbalest round.

TheAnvilOfTheCollective.name: The Anvil Of The Collective
TheAnvilOfTheCollective.description: Defeat 4 enemies with a single Hammer shot.

TheAscendance.name: The Ascendance
TheAscendance.description: Execute an Ascendance Sequence for the first time.

TheBiggerTheyAre.name: The Bigger They Are
TheBiggerTheyAre.description: Defeat the Terror in the Steelworks.

TheOrthodox.name: The Orthodox
TheOrthodox.description: Finish the game only with the Essences appointed by the Collective.

ThePathfinder.name: The Pathfinder
ThePathfinder.description: Get the Pathfinder to the tram.

ThePreserver.name: The Preserver
ThePreserver.description: Transfer the Essences from all fallen Travelers.

ToBringThemBack.name: To Bring Them Back
ToBringThemBack.description: Transfer an Essence from a fallen Traveler.

Togetherness.name: Togetherness
Togetherness.description: Gather together the Essences of Lidia, Marcel and Krzysztof.

UnadulteratedJoy.name: Unadulterated Joy
UnadulteratedJoy.description: Find all of the comic books.

YouNeverGiveUp.name: You Never Give Up
YouNeverGiveUp.description: Finish the game in the NG+.

SurvivePyramidHeadChase.name: Alone Again
SurvivePyramidHeadChase.description: Survive the chase in Brookhaven Hospital.

Archivist.name: Archivist
Archivist.description: Collect all memos in a single playthrough.

FinishGameNoRangeWeapon.name: As Close as You Like
FinishGameNoRangeWeapon.description: Finish the game without killing enemies using ranged weapons.

FindAllPastLocations.name: Echoes
FindAllPastLocations.description: Witness all glimpses of the past in a single playthrough.

FastAsFog.name: Faster Than Fog
FastAsFog.description: Finish the game in under 10 hours.

CompleteNewGamePlus.name: I Saw That Town
CompleteNewGamePlus.description: Complete New Game Plus on any difficulty.

ReachLongStaircaseEnd.name: Into the Abyss
ReachLongStaircaseEnd.description: Reach the end of the long staircase.

UseAllWeapons.name: James of All Trades
UseAllWeapons.description: Kill at least one enemy with Wooden Plank, Steel Pipe, Handgun, Shotgun and Rifle in a single playthrough.

PizzaInBowling.name: Leftovers
PizzaInBowling.description: Find the pizza in Pete's Bowl-O-Rama.

ShootBalloonsWoodsideApart.name: Let's NOT Party!
ShootBalloonsWoodsideApart.description: Shoot all the balloons in Wood Side Apartments.

FinishEnemiesWithStomp.name: Merciless
FinishEnemiesWithStomp.description: Finish off 50 enemies with a stomp attack.

TryToLeaveObservationDeck.name: No Turning Back Now
TryToLeaveObservationDeck.description: Try to leave Silent Hill in the Observation Deck area.

ReachBlueCreekApartments.name: Otherworldly
ReachBlueCreekApartments.description: Enter the Otherworld for the first time.

SeeAllCanonEndings.name: Party Like It's 2001
SeeAllCanonEndings.description: See all classic endings (Leave, Maria, In Water, Rebirth, Dog).

DefeatPyramidHead.name: Passed
DefeatPyramidHead.description: Make your way out of Blue Creek Apartments.

FindPhotos.name: Pieces Unarranged
FindPhotos.description: Collect all the Strange Photos in a single playthrough.

RadioSilence.name: Radio Silence
RadioSilence.description: Complete the game without using the radio.

LongSwimInTolucaLake.name: Scourge of Toluca Lake
LongSwimInTolucaLake.description: Spend 10 minutes out on Toluca Lake.

TryToOpenClosedDoors.name: You Never Know...
TryToOpenClosedDoors.description: Try to open locked doors 50 times.
